attributes.action: Britain should return the Kohinoor diamond  back to India
attributes.additional_details: The diamond was taken by Britain from India and should now be returned back to the Indian Government.
attributes.background: Britain should return the Kohinoor diamond back to India.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the Koh-I-Noor diamond is part of the Crown Jewels and the decision to return it would be a matter for the Royal Family, not the UK Government or Parliament.
